messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the main purpose of the Chaosium publications in this scenario?
Determining locations of the various non-player characters who live outside of Miskatonic University.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the relationship of the investigator to Leiter?
Not specified
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Which source books are not essential for running this scenario?
Call of Cthulhu source books
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can Game statistics for each character be found?
Appendix at the end of the scenario
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the name of the Arkham setting in Lovecraft's works?
Arkham
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can investigators find game statistics for each character in the scenario?
In the Appendix at the end of the scenario.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of the Arkham Witch Trial Papers in the scenario?
To describe each potential culprit as an innocent party.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the rest of the entry for a chosen culprit after the Keeper has selected one?
It may be necessary to rework the rest of the entry, making alterations to the character as required.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is Bryce Fallon?
Bryce Fallon, the Dean of Administration at the Miskatonic University.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How old is Bryce Fallon?
Bryce Fallon is in his early fifties.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Bryce Fallon's occupation?
Bryce Fallon is the Dean of Administration at the Miskatonic University.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How is Bryce Fallon described?
Bryce Fallon is a charming, immaculately turned-out man.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary goal of Bryce Fallon's interest in the missing papers?
The preservation of the reputation of the Miskatonic University
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Bryce Fallon's former specialty?
Mathematics
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What motivates Bryce Fallon to turn a blind eye to certain actions?
The preservation of the reputation of the Miskatonic University
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary goal of the University's administration, according to the text?
Pure academia
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Bryce Fallon's primary goal in dealing with the Witch Trial Papers?
The preservation of the reputation of the Miskatonic University is his primary goal.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does Bryce Fallon feel about Leiter's personal life?
He will greet any revelations about Leiter's personal life with disdain but not surprise.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does Bryce Fallon think of Leiter's personality?
He knows him to be competent and ambitious, and more than a little bit oily.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Bryce Fallon's relationship like with Leiter outside of work?
He knew Leiter professionally but not personally outside of work.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Fallon's attitude towards the Witch Trial Papers?
He will quite happily go along with anything that will see the matter of the Witch Trial Papers 'dealt with satisfactorily'.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does Fallon perceive Leiter?
He knows Leiter to be competent and ambitious, and more than a little bit oily.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the general attitude of T. Fallon towards Leiter's personal life?
He will greet any revelations about Leiter's personal life with distain but not surprise
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What information does T. Fallon have about the cause of the mysterious death?
He has no idea of the cause other than 'violent seizure'.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was Leiter's prior career, according to T. Fallon?
Prior career as an art student at MU
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What contact information can T. Fallon provide to the investigators?
Keys to Leiter's office and home, as well as contact with any relevant members of the Faculty
